scripts.build:commonjs: mkdir -p dist/commonjs && pbjs --no-delimited --no-convert --no-verify -t static-module -w commonjs -o dist/commonjs/index.js src/* && pbts -o dist/commonjs/index.d.ts dist/commonjs/index.js
scripts.build:esm: mkdir -p dist/esm && pbjs --no-delimited --no-convert --no-verify -t static-module --es6 -w es6 -o dist/esm/index.js src/* && pbts -o dist/esm/index.d.ts dist/esm/index.js
